lead_paragraph: FREIWALD--Benjamin, passed away December 22nd, 2015 in Hollywood, California. Benjamin is predeceased by his mother Kathleen Preston Knight. He is survived by his father Joshua Freiwald, sister Jessica Watt, partner and mother of his child Laura Strayer, and daughter Imogen Freiwald. His family and friends laid him to rest in The Garden of Legends at Hollywood Forever on Friday, January 8th, 2016. Benjamin was born on May 12th, 1963 at Kaiser Hospital San Francisco. Benjamin is a long standing member of the ACLU. Donations in his memory can made at www.aclu.org/freiwald. 1/3
